DataElement.preferredName: DART Current Other Problem Descriptive Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated description of another problem not already specified.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Distress Assessment and Response Tool Current Other Problem Description
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A short, self-assessment to measure an individual's physical symptoms, emotional burden and practical concerns that could interfere with their ability to engage in cancer treatment._Occurring in or belonging to the present time._Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned._A difficulty, disorder, or condition needing resolution._A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A short, self-assessment to measure an individual's physical symptoms, emotional burden and practical concerns that could interfere with their ability to engage in cancer treatment.

Concepts.definition: A short, self-assessment to measure an individual's physical symptoms, emotional burden and practical concerns that could interfere with their ability to engage in cancer treatment.

Property.preferredDefinition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time.:Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.:A difficulty, disorder, or condition needing resolution.:A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something.

Concepts.definition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time.
Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
A difficulty, disorder, or condition needing resolution.
A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

DataElementConcept.origin: DART:Distress Assessment and Response Tool, Form D-5668. University Health Network DART Team, Toronto, Canada, 3/2013.
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for Princess Margaret MBO request 11.8.17 mc

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The text that provides a description of a topic.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Text; the words of something written.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/22/22 jk added "Qualified" RS as part of MCL quarterly content review.
